verses.verse: He said <WH559> to me, <WH1121> Son of man, <WH120> eat <WH398> that which you find. <WH4672> Eat <WH398> this scroll, <WH4039> and go, <WH3212> speak <WH1696> to the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>
So I opened <WH6605> my mouth, <WH6310> and he caused me to eat <WH398> the scroll. <WH4039>

He said <WH559> to me, <WH1121> Son of man, <WH120> cause your belly <WH990> to eat, <WH398> and fill <WH4390> your bowels <WH4578> with this scroll <WH4039> that I give <WH5414> you. <WH398> Then I ate it; <WH4966> and it was as sweet as honey <WH1706> in my mouth. <WH6310>
He said <WH559> to me, <WH1121> Son of man, <WH120> go <WH3212> to <WH935> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> and speak <WH1696> my words to them. <WH1697>
For you are not sent <WH7971> to a people <WH5971> of a strange <WH6012> speech <WH8193> and of a hard <WH3515> language, <WH3956> but to the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478>

not to many <WH7227> peoples <WH5971> of a strange <WH6012> speech <WH8193> and of a hard <WH3515> language, <WH3956> whose words <WH1697> you can not understand. <WH8085> Surely, <WH7971> if I sent you to them, <WH8085> they would listen to you.

But the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> will <WH14> not listen <WH8085> to you; <WH14> for they will not listen <WH8085> to me: <WH1004> for all the house of Israel <WH3478> are obstinate <WH2389> and hard-hearted. <WH7186>
Behold, <WH5414> I have made your face <WH6440> hard <WH2389> against <WH5980> their faces, <WH6440> and your forehead <WH4696> hard <WH2389> against <WH5980> their foreheads. <WH4696>

As an adamant <WH8068> harder <WH2389> than flint <WH6864> have I made <WH5414> your forehead: <WH4696> don't <WH3372> be afraid of them, <WH2865> neither be dismayed at their looks, <WH6440> though they are a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>

Moreover he said <WH559> to me, <WH1121> Son of man, <WH120> all my words <WH1697> that I shall speak <WH1696> to you receive <WH3947> in your heart, <WH3824> and hear <WH8085> with your ears. <WH241>

Go <WH3212> to <WH935> them of the captivity, <WH1473> to the children <WH1121> of your people, <WH5971> and speak <WH1696> to them, <WH559> and tell them, <WH559> Thus says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh; <WH3069> whether they will hear, <WH8085> or whether they will forbear. <WH2308>

Then the Spirit <WH7307> lifted me up, <WH5375> and I heard <WH8085> behind <WH310> me the voice <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> rushing, <WH7494> saying, <WH1288> Blessed be the glory <WH3519> of Yahweh <WH3068> from his place. <WH4725>

I heard the noise <WH6963> of the wings <WH3671> of the living creatures <WH2416> as they touched <WH5401> one <WH802> another, <WH269> and the noise <WH6963> of the wheels <WH212> beside <WH5980> them, <WH6963> even the noise of a great <WH1419> rushing. <WH7494>

So the Spirit <WH7307> lifted me up, <WH5375> and took me away; <WH3947> and I went <WH3212> in bitterness, <WH4751> in the heat <WH2534> of my spirit; <WH7307> and the hand <WH3027> of Yahweh <WH3068> was strong on me. <WH2388>

Then I came <WH935> to them of the captivity <WH1473> at Tel Aviv, <WH8512> that lived <WH3427> by the river <WH5104> Chebar, <WH3529> and to where they lived; <WH3427> and I sat <WH3427> there <WH3427> overwhelmed <WH8074> among <WH8432> them seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>
It happened at the end <WH7097> of seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> that the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> I have made <WH5414> you a watchman <WH6822> to the house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> therefore hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> from my mouth, <WH6310> and give them warning from me. <WH2094>

When I tell <WH559> the wicked, <WH7563> You shall surely <WH4191> die; <WH4191> and you give him no warning, <WH2094> nor speak <WH1696> to warn <WH2094> the wicked <WH7563> from his wicked <WH7563> way, <WH1870> to save his life; <WH2421> the same wicked <WH7563> man shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity; <WH5771> but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> at your hand. <WH3027>

Yet if you warn <WH2094> the wicked, <WH7563> and he doesn't <WH7725> turn from his wickedness, <WH7562> nor from his wicked <WH7563> way, <WH1870> he shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity; <WH5771> but you have delivered <WH5337> your soul. <WH5315>

Again, <WH7725> when a righteous <WH6662> man does turn <WH7725> from his righteousness, <WH6664> and commit <WH6213> iniquity, <WH5766> and I lay <WH5414> a stumbling block <WH4383> before <WH6440> him, <WH4191> he shall die: because you have not given him warning, <WH2094> he shall die <WH4191> in his sin, <WH2403> and his righteous <WH6666> deeds which he has done <WH6213> shall not be remembered; <WH2142> but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> at your hand. <WH3027>

Nevertheless if you warn <WH2094> the righteous <WH6662> man, <WH6662> that the righteous not sin, <WH2398> and he does not sin, <WH2398> he shall surely <WH2421> live, <WH2421> because he took warning; <WH2094> and you have delivered <WH5337> your soul. <WH5315>
The hand <WH3027> of Yahweh <WH3068> was there on me; <WH559> and he said to me, <WH6965> Arise, go forth <WH3318> into the plain, <WH1237> and I will there talk with you. <WH1696>

Then I arose, <WH6965> and went forth <WH3318> into the plain: <WH1237> and behold, <WH3519> the glory of Yahweh <WH3068> stood <WH5975> there, <WH3519> as the glory which I saw <WH7200> by the river <WH5104> Chebar; <WH3529> and I fell <WH5307> on my face. <WH6440>

Then the Spirit <WH7307> entered <WH935> into me, <WH5975> and set me on my feet; <WH7272> and he spoke <WH1696> with me, <WH559> and said to me, <WH935> Go, shut <WH5462> yourself inside <WH8432> your house. <WH1004>
But you, <WH1121> son of man, <WH120> behold, <WH5414> they shall lay bands <WH5688> on you, <WH631> and shall bind you with them, <WH3318> and you shall not go out among them: <WH8432>

and I will make your tongue <WH3956> stick <WH1692> to the roof of your mouth, <WH2441> that you shall be mute, <WH481> and shall not be to them a reprover; <WH376> for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>

But when I speak <WH1696> with <WH854> you, <WH6605> I will open your mouth, <WH6310> and you shall tell <WH559> them, <WH559> Thus says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> He who hears, <WH8085> let him hear; <WH8085> and he who forbears, <WH2308> let him forbear: <WH2308> for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>
